import React from 'react'; import API from '../../../service/homeservice'; class Product extends React.Component { constructor(props) { console.log("props Home======", props); super(props); this.state = { bannerList:[] } } componentDidMount(){ console.log("msg axios calling") API.BannerList(). then((findresponse) => { console.log("BannerList response===", findresponse); this.setState({bannerList:findresponse.data.data}); console.log("BannerList response===", this.state.bannerList); }).catch( { status: 500, message: 'Internal Server Error' } ); } render() { return (
